Key Match Events: Eduardo Vargas scored a header from a Felipe Loyola cross in the second minute to put Chile in front.
Igor Jesus scored a header in added time before the break to equalize for Brazil.
Luiz Henrique scored the winning goal for Brazil in the 89th minute with a curling strike from the edge of the box.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brazil's victory lifted them to fourth in the standings with 13 points.
Chile are second from bottom on five points.
The match was held at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos in Santiago, Chile.
